Name: Virtual Desktop Dashboard
About the game: The Virtual Desktop Dashboard lets you see and use your computer while in any VR app or game with minimal overhead. You can detach the desktop, move and resize it and it will remain visible while you play other games. You can cycle through all connected monitors.
